pageContext.claim: “Facebook, Twitter and Google are so biased toward the Dems it is ridiculous! Twitter, in fact, has made it much more difficult for people to join @realDonaldTrump. They have removed many names & greatly slowed the level and speed of increase. They have acknowledged-done NOTHING!”
pageContext.analysis: Twitter has removed a number of fake accounts over the summer, which caused people with large followings to lose followers, but also to have a more accurate count. There's little evidence to suggest the tech companies are intentionally biased toward on political ideology or the other.
